entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as peering around the edge of the sofa and holding Bellatrix's wand.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as supporting Hermione and holding a short silver knife to her throat.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being unconscious and having a short silver knife pressed against her throat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as standing rigid and clutching Wormtail's wand.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as the owner of the wand that Ron is holding.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is mentioned as the location where the scene is taking place.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is pressing a short silver knife against Hermione's throat.
